name: Wheels of WAR
description:
The Wheels of WAR is an online multiplayer Game. The game is a fight between cars for survival in the world. There are different game modes Free for all, team match, death race, Survivor, and stun race. The Wheels of WAR give you new warfare that involves driving skills and shooting skills.

Winning each game will increase the ranking and XP. With it, you can upgrade weapons and cars. With the upgrade participate in the tournament to win the prize. The competition will start in mid of 2023.

Because still we are in development we continue our work in bug solving upgrading the game physics and much more.
